UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Modulation of antimicrobial potency of human cathelicidin peptides against the ESKAPE pathogens and in vivo efficacy in a murine catheter-associated biofilm model.
Literature.Author: Narayana JL, Mishra B, Lushnikova T, Golla RM, Wang G

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:32.5% Hemolysis=220 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>440 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecium ATCC 51559(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=3.1µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=12.5µM),Acinetobacter baumannii B28-16(MIC=3.1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=6.25µM),Enterobacter cloacae B2366-12(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus Newman(MIC=3.1µM),Staphylococcus aureus MU50(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus SA546(MIC=3.1µM),Staphylococcus aureus UAMS-1(MIC=3.1µM)
